Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Stefan Fallert. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

  • Lea Li. Author, copyright holder.
    Contributed the first implementation of the metabolic scaling

  • Juliano Sarmento Cabral. Author, copyright holder, thesis advisor.

  • Tyler Morgan-Wall. Contributor, copyright holder.

  • Bavarian Ministry of Science and Arts (bayklif). Funder.

  • Deutsche Bundesstiftung Umwelt (DBU). Funder.
